articles.title: Meeting of Political Bureau of C.C., WPK Held under Guidance of Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Meeting of Political Bureau of C.C., WPK Held under Guidance of Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- A meeting of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea was held under the guidance of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, on April 8.
					 It was attended by members of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK, and members and alternate members of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK.
					
					 Vice-premiers of the Cabinet and some department directors, first vice-department directors and vice-department directors of the C.C., the WPK were present at the meeting as observers.
					
					 The meeting discussed the issue of reinforcing the organization for increasing the leadership role and function of the Party as required by the developing revolution.
					
					 It discussed a proposal for forming the state leadership body to be submitted to the First Session of the 13th Supreme People's Assembly.
					
					 It also discussed an organizational matter.
					
					 Decisions on the relevant agenda items were unanimously adopted at the meeting.
					
					 Kim Jong Un at the meeting set forth important tasks to be fulfilled to further strengthen the WPK to be an invincible revolutionary party, firmly protect the dignity and sovereignty of the country and dynamically accelerate the work to improve the standard of the people's living and the building of a rich and powerful country.
					
					 The meeting held under the guidance of Kim Jong Un marks a historic occasion that encouraged the service personnel and people in the struggle to dynamically advance along the road of independence, Songun and socialism under the uplifted banner of great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and provided an important milestone in bringing earlier the building of a thriving nation and a great revolutionary event of national reunification.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks 21st Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as Chairman of NDC of DPRK
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks 21st Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as Chairman of NDC of DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place here on Tuesday to celebrate the 21st anniversary of the election of General Secretary Kim Jong Il as chairman of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior party, state and army officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, chief secretaries of provincial committees of the Workers' Party of Korea, participants in the 1st Session of the 13th Supreme People's Assembly, officials of party and armed forces organs, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, officials of industrial establishments, labor innovators and persons of meritorious services in Pyongyang.
					
					 Pak Pong Ju, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea and premier of the Cabinet, made a report at the meeting.
					
					 He said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the NDC of the DPRK on April 9, Juche 82 (1993) was a historic event of epochal significance in achieving the prosperity of the country and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Recalling that Kim Jong Il was elected chairman of the NDC at a crucial period of historical turn in accomplishing the cause of socialism, the reporter went on: He led Songun Korea along the road of victory with his outstanding idea, leadership and superhuman energy.
					
					 He supplemented and rounded off from a new angle the Socialist Constitution of the DPRK and made sure that the state machinery with  the NDC as a pivot was established, thus providing a powerful sovereign guarantee for triumphantly advancing the revolution and construction under the banner of Songun.
					
					 He firmly established an independent stand in the nation-building and activities and led the DPRK to thoroughly apply the Korean style and Juche type in the revolution and construction, demonstrating the might of socialist Korea before the whole world.
					
					 He saw to it that the principle of independence was thoroughly applied to foreign relations at all times and conducted energetic external activities to create an international environment in favor of the Korean revolution and the building of a thriving nation and defend international justice and global peace and security.
					
					 He turned the DPRK into a political and ideological power by letting all the service personnel and people form an indestructible harmonious whole in which they share the destiny with the leader, single-mindedly united around him, and grow to be a huge unit of staunch fighters and devoted implementers who turn out as one in response to his call to flatten even a mountain and empty a sea.
					
					 He clearly indicated important guidelines for army-building in the era of Songun and trained the Korean People's Army into a vanguard unit devotedly defending the leader and the powerful elite Paektusan revolutionary army.
					
					 Under his leadership the independent defence industry provided by President Kim Il Sung has been put on the foundation of latest science and technology and the DPRK has the self-defensive war deterrent capable of smashing any formidable enemy at one blow.
					
					 Kim Jong Il devoted his all to the morrow of a rich and powerful country, possessed of the revolutionary outlook on life "Let's live not merely for today but for tomorrow." Thanks to his patriotic devotion, the road of putting industrialization on a CNC basis of Korean style was explored to bring about the industrial revolution in the new century and pave a wide avenue for building a scientific and technological power and a knowledge-based economic power.
					
					 He regarded the country's reunification as the supreme patriotic cause of the nation and energetically led the struggle to achieve it, ushering in the June 15 era of reunification advancing in the idea of By Our Nation Itself and laying a solid foundation for the independent reunification of the country and its peace and prosperity.
					
					 His idea and cause of nation-building in the era of Songun are being successfully carried forward by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Immensely rosy is the future of the DPRK making a leap forward full of conviction according to the timetable for the victory of the building of a thriving nation set by the great WPK, flying the immortal flag of the sun, the reporter concluded.

articles.title: Hall of Wax Replica of Kim Jong Il Opens
articles.content:
Hall of Wax Replica of Kim Jong Il Opens
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- A hall of wax replica of General Secretary Kim Jong Il was opened at the International Friendship Exhibition House in the DPRK.
					 The hall is featured by a wax replica depicting Kim Jong Il standing in padded clothes atop Mt. Paektu, encouraging the service personnel and people of the DPRK advancing towards the final victory of the Juche revolution under the guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un. The gifts he received from personages and people from various countries of the world are on display there.
					
					 An opening ceremony was held on Tuesday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop and officials concerned, officials and employees of the exhibition house, soldiers, builders and others.
					
					 Present on invitation were Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, staff members of the Chinese embassy here and chief of the Great Man Wax Museum of China and his party.
					
					 Choe Thae Bok, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, made an address.
					
					 He said it is a great honor and pride of the great Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea to have the wax replica of Kim Jong Il at the International Friendship Exhibition House.
					
					 He noted that it is an expression of profound reverence and the deepest respect of the Chinese and Korean people for the peerlessly great man that staff members of the Chinese museum made the wax replica of Kim Jong Il with all sincerity and creators of the DPRK more truthfully depicted him in such a manner that he looks like in his lifetime.
					
					 He expressed deep thanks to staff members of the Chinese museum for creating the wax replica of Kim Jong Il at the highest level after successfully making wax replicas of President Kim Il Sung and anti-Japanese hero Kim Jong Suk so that they might stand in the exhibition house.
					
					 Zhang Molei, chief of the Great Man Wax Museum of China, made a speech.
					
					 He noted that Kim Jong Il, a great statesman, thinker and military strategist, led the Korean people to achieve a shining victory by dint of his outstanding leadership.
					
					 The Chinese people will always remember the exploits Kim Jong Il performed by making a contribution to the development of the friendly relations between the two peoples all his life, he said.
					
					 Kim Jong Il will always live in the hearts of the two peoples along with the history of friendship between the two parties and peoples with the long history and tradition, he noted.
					
					 The participants paid tribute to the wax replica of Kim Jong Il and looked round the gifts on display.

articles.title: Floral Basket Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Basket Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Senior party, state and army officials including Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and Choe Ryong Hae and deputies who will take part in the First Session of the 13th Supreme People's Assembly visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Tuesday.
					 The deputies laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statues before paying tribute to them.

articles.title: Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Deputies to the 13th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK to attend its first session visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Tuesday.
					 They paid tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 In the halls where Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state, the deputies made bows to them.
					
					 They went round the halls in which the orders associated with the ardent reverence of the Korean people and progressive mankind for them are on display and the halls which house cars, an electric car, a boat and train coaches they used during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Meets Delegation of Hungarian Foreign Ministry
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Meets Delegation of Hungarian Foreign Ministry
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun met and had a talk with a delegation of the Hungarian Ministry of Foreign Affairs led by Director General Peter Jakab which paid a courtesy call on him on Tuesday.

articles.title: Hungarian FM Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Hungarian FM Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Hungarian Ministry of Foreign Affairs led by Director General Peter Jakab visited Mangyongdae on Tuesday.
					 Being briefed on the story about the historic old home in Mangyongdae where President Kim Il Sung was born and spent his childhood, nurturing a great intention of revolution, the guests went round historical relics preserved with much care.

articles.title: Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on the occasions of the 2nd anniversary of his election as first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK and the 21st anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the NDC of the DPRK.
					 The floral basket and congratulatory letter were handed over to Jang Jong Nam, minister of the People's Armed Forces, on Tuesday by Military Attache of the Iranian embassy Hassan Reza Husseini who is the doyen of the military attaches corps.

articles.title: Art Troupe of Koreans in U.S. Here
articles.content:
Art Troupe of Koreans in U.S. Here
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- An art troupe of Koreans in the U.S. arrived here on Tuesday by air to take part in the 29th April Spring Friendship Art Festival.

articles.title: Officials and Members of Women's Union Meet
articles.content:
Officials and Members of Women's Union Meet
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- A meeting of officials and members of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea took place at the Hall of Women on Tuesday on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's election as first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 A report made by Kim Jong Sun, chairwoman of the C.C., the women's union, was followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said that as the Korean people held Kim Jong Un at the helm of the WPK and the state in high esteem, the tradition of the Juche revolution and the Songun revolution pioneered and led by President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il has been given steady continuity and the ever-victorious future of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea firmly guaranteed.
					
					 The past two years witnessed a striking demonstration of the iron faith, will and extraordinary leadership ability of Kim Jong Un to turn the DPRK into a thriving socialist nation by glorifying the feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il generation after generation and consolidating the single-minded unity of the party and the revolutionary ranks in every way, they noted.
					
					 It is a great fortune and pride and greatest honor to hold Kim Jong Un, a rare statesman and peerlessly brilliant Songun commander, at the helm of the revolution, they said.
					
					 They underscored the need to usher in the period of prosperity of Songun Korea by making a fresh leap forward on all fronts for the building of a thriving nation under his leadership.

articles.title: Week of Film Show Opens to Celebrate Day of Sun
articles.content:
Week of Film Show Opens to Celebrate Day of Sun
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- A week of film show opened in the DPRK to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun).
					 "Finding Himself among the People All His Life", "The Fatherly Leader Finding Himself among Workers", "Revolutionary Obligation" and other documentary films will be screened at cinemas and halls of culture in Pyongyang and local areas during the period. The films deal with the revolutionary feats of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Also screened there will be "Star of Korea", "A Summer at Hwasong Uisuk School", "The Sun of the Nation", "A Photo", "Wolmi Island" and other feature films.
					
					 An opening ceremony took place at the Pyongyang International Cinema House on Tuesday.
					
					 Present there were officials concerned, creators and artistes in the field of film art and Pyongyangites.
					
					 Han Chol, vice-minister of Culture, made an opening address.
					
					 At the end of the opening ceremony the participants watched documentary film "Finding Himself among the People All His Life" (6).

articles.title: National Photo Show Opens
articles.content:
National Photo Show Opens
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- A national photo show "Ushering in the period of prosperity of Songun Korea" opened with due ceremony at the Grand People's Study House on Monday in celebration of the 2nd anniversary of holding supreme leader Kim Jong Un at the helm of the Workers' Party of Korea and the state.
					 Displayed at the show hall are photos of Kim Jong Un, who is glorifying the party and state of the DPRK as glorious party and state of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and demonstrating the independent dignity and power of Songun Korea.
					
					 Also displayed are photos showing the successes achieved by the service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned and Pyongyangites.
					
					 Vice-Premier Kim Yong Jin made an opening speech.
					
					 He said that the show would offer officials and working people an opportunity to have confidence that Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea would prosper for all ages as Kim Jong Un is leading the Korean revolution.
					
					 The participants looked round the show hall.

articles.title: Poster for 16th Kimilsungia Festival Produced
articles.content:
Poster for 16th Kimilsungia Festival Produced 
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- A poster for the 16th Kimilsungia Festival was produced. The festival is to be held in Pyongyang on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The poster depicts the President's old home in Mangyongdae amid flowers and beautiful Kimilsungia in full bloom against the background of sky bright with glow.
					
					 Seen on the poster are letters reading "The great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung will always be with us", "Day of Sun", "16th Kimilsungia Festival" as well as a festival logo, venue and period of the festival.

articles.title: Pyongyang Busy with Preparations for April Spring Friendship Art Festival
articles.content:
Pyongyang Busy with Preparations for April Spring Friendship Art Festival
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang is busy with the preparations for the 29th April Spring Friendship Art Festival.
					 The festival will bring together prestigious art troupes, famous artistes, international concours winners and others from dozens of countries including China, Russia, Malaysia, Mongolia, Austria, Ukraine, Vietnam and Cuba and overseas Korean artistes.
					
					 Pyongyang will also welcome figures in the fields of culture and arts coming to swap achievements and experience gained in creating music, dances and acrobatics.
					
					 The organizing committee for the festival has finished the arrangements for the festival.
					
					 All specific preparations have been wound up to ensure successful opening and closing ceremonies suited to the characteristic features of the international art festival. All arrangements have been made to host its participants and create a festive atmosphere.
					
					 The East Pyongyang Grand Theatre, the Pyongyang Grand Theatre, the Moranbong Theatre, the Pyongyang Circus Theatre and other venues of the festival for group or separate performance and joint performances are provided with all conditions so that artistes may fully display artistry and talents.
					
					 Audiences will be pleased to watch art presentations against ever-changing and fantastic backgrounds of stages at the theatres equipped with the latest lighting and sound facilities.
					
					 The organizing committee finished preparing diplomas and statuettes to be awarded to the successful artistes and worked out good tour programs for the participants. 
					
					 They will have chances to tour monumental edifices, recreation grounds and cultural institutions in Pyongyang and take part in colorful and significant events such as friendship joint meeting according to their wishes.

articles.title: New Species of Poplar Cultivated in DPRK
articles.content:
New Species of Poplar Cultivated in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The Thremmatology Institute under the Academy of Forestry in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has cultivated a new species of Tumangang Poplar, high in economic and landscape value.
					 The DPRK boasts of various species of poplar trees, including Pyongyang Poplar, Taedonggang Poplar and Kangson Poplar, but most of them grow in the areas under 500 meters above the sea level.
					
					 Highly resistant to cold weather, the new species of tree grows 2 to 2.5 times faster than Pyongyang Poplar in the central northern area of the country.
					
					 When its cutting is planted, the rate of rooting reaches above 95 percent with its cultivation possible even in the areas under 800 meters above the sea level.
					
					 When forests are created with these trees it is possible to produce 250 cubic meters of pulp timber per hectare within five years.
					
					 Its leaves, with 20 percent of crude protein, can be used as feed for domestic animals.

articles.title: Chima and Jogori, Traditional Korean Costume
articles.content:
Chima and Jogori, Traditional Korean Costume
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- From olden times, the Korean women have liked to put on chima (skirt) and jogori (jacket) in spring season.
					 As a traditional costume, chima and jogori is humble and noble in form, beautiful in pattern and elegant in color.
					
					 The costume, varied in form and color according to seasons, represents the emotions and elegancy of the Korean women.
					
					 It is a custom for the Korean women to put on this costume on wedding days or galas.
					
					 A Korean dress exhibition takes place in Pyongyang every year, at which tailors would share their experiences in developing the costume.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls upon Scientists and Technicians to Fulfill Their Duties
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls upon Scientists and Technicians to Fulfill Their Duties 
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an editorial says the scientific and technological front is an outpost for defending socialism.
					 The scientific and technological sector is one of the main targets of the heinous hostile policy toward the DPRK pursued by the U.S. and other imperialists and their final aim is to cut off the lifeline of the DPRK, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 If one lags a step behind in science and technology, one cannot escape the destiny of a backward country, a colonial slave in the technological aspect as it is compelled to take ten, nay a hundred steps back in all other sectors and, in the long run, one will not be able to protect the sovereignty of the country and the nation.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea is considering the scientific and technological front as the outpost for defending socialism. Its main idea is to make people always remember that there go on an acute and fierce scientific and technological confrontation with the imperialists and a drive for pushing back the frontiers of latest science and technology which are decisive of the rise and fall of the country and the nation not only at battle fields where guns are leveled at each other but also at all worksites and posts.
					
					 The scientific and technological front is the outpost for defending socialism while the scientists and technicians are the frontline soldiers waging a do-or-die battle.
					
					 Now is the time for the scientists and technicians to give fullest play to the creative ingenuity, wisdom and talents they have cultivated under the care of the WPK for the prosperity of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea and its bright future.
					
					 All the scientists and technicians should foil the base and vicious moves of the imperialists and all reactionaries, who are displeased to see the DPRK achieving prosperity and well-being, by dint of science and technology and fulfill their mission and duties as the standard-bearers and frontline soldiers in the efforts to defend and glorify the socialist system by dint of science and technology.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Giving Full Play to Revolutionary Comradeship
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Giving Full Play to Revolutionary Comradeship 
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Revolutionary comradeship is like life-giving water to bring up all the service personnel and people to be staunch defenders of the leader and provides a fundamental guarantee for consolidating the single-minded unity of the party and revolutionary ranks. It serves as an ideological and mental source that turns the society into a great harmonious whole. Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in an article.
					 It goes on: The Korean revolution which has advanced under the banner of devotedly defending the leader is associated with President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il's warm love and trust in their comrades.
					
					 It was thanks to their warm love and trust that the nation produced Kim Hyok, Cha Kwang Su, O Jung Hup and other fighters who devotedly protected the leader and lots of self-blasting fighters and human bullets and bombs like Kil Yong Jo.
					
					 The spirit of defending the leader is being given fullest play among the service personnel and people.
					
					 The bottom-line of this noble mental spirit is the profound love and trust of Marshal Kim Jong Un in the revolutionary comrades as it is considered as the starting point of the thoughts and practices of all service personnel and people. 
					
					 Touched by his profound comradeship, ranks of genuine comrades-in-arms are growing strong to invariably follow the road of the Songun revolution despite rain or snow and the revolutionary ranks are turning into a fortress based on single-minded unity.
					
					 No machinations on the part of the imperialists can ever undermine the big socialist family having Kim Jong Un, the supreme incarnation of human love and best example of revolutionary comradeship, as its father.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Authorities Not Qualified to Talk about "Missile Threat"
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Authorities Not Qualified to Talk about "Missile Threat"
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the south Korean warmongers conducted the test-fire of a 500 km range ballistic missile in a firing range in Thaean, South Chungchong Province. The puppet military reorganized a guided missile command into a huge missile command.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is an open military provocation and a clear proof of the anti-DPRK war hysteria.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean warmongers are apt to grumble about "missile threat" from the DPRK.
					
					 The puppet forces have become frantic in their moves to develop and deploy ballistic missiles at the tacit connivance and instigation of the U.S.
					
					 It is a height of shamelessness for them to try to impose fresh sanctions on the DPRK by charging it with "violation" and "provocation".
					
					 They claim their ballistic missiles are not problematic and the step of increasing military capabilities taken by the DPRK for self-defence is "provocation" and "threat". This gangster-like logic only arouses the jeers of the world people.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean authorities have neither justification nor face to charge the DPRK with the "violation of UN resolutions".
					
					 No matter how desperately the U.S. and the south Korean ruling quarters may kick up the racket to escalate confrontation with the DPRK, it will make steady efforts to bolster up the military capabilities for self-defence as long as there exists the aggressive provocation of the hostile forces.
					
					 The south Korean warmongers would be well advised to stop running amuck, clearly understanding that the military provocation against the DPRK is a suicidal choice.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye's Speech Termed Hypocritical
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye's Speech Termed Hypocritical
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- A poem accusing the chief executive of her anti-reunification remarks was posted on the south Korean internet paper Jaju Minbo on April 1.
					 The speech made by Park Geun Hye during her tour of Germany was peppered with hypocrisy and lies, the poem said.
					
					 It is a pipedream to claim that if the north dismantles its nukes, the south will "assist" the north, it charged.
					
					 It laid bare Park's sinister intention and ambition to stifle fellow countrymen in the north as she let loose a string of jargons about "homogeneity of the Korean nation", not uttering even a word about the July 4 joint statement, the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 If she really deems it painful to see fellow countrymen living separated, she should stop at once the Ssangyong drill for aggression aimed at "occupying Pyongyang", to begin with, it held.
					
					 It urged Park to discontinue a spurious wordplay and force the barbarian GIs out of south Korea, first of all.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Call for "Humanitarianism" Is Hypocritic: News Analyst
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Call for "Humanitarianism" Is Hypocritic: News Analyst
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The puppet authorities of south Korea are still making a mockery of the nation, advertising about "humanitarianism".
					 Its chief executive, Park Geun Hye, slandered the DPRK over "humanitarianism" and "human rights" during her foreign tour, while her hirelings hijacked a DPRK fishing boat in distress due to engine trouble.
					
					 Not content with threatening the boat with gunshots, the south Korean navy gangsters committed outrages on its sailors with iron bars and hooks. Furthermore, they forced "defection" upon them.
					
					 The outrages clearly reveal sham humanitarianism touted by the south Korean authorities whenever an opportunity presents itself to talk about "human rights."
					
					 In actuality the south Korean authorities have no face to talk about humanitarianism since they have done wrongs against it in recent months alone.
					
					 It is a well-known fact that the humanitarian work for reunion of separated families and relatives from the north and the south of Korea was suspended last year, due to the improper behavior of the south side, which did not respect its dialogue partner and spoiled the atmosphere for improved north-south relations.
					
					 In February this year the DPRK generously agreed to south Korea's proposal for resuming the reunion of separated families and their relatives, out of the desire to alleviate even a bit the sufferings caused by national division.
					
					 But, the authorities of south Korea responded to the DPRK's generosity with Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills aimed at an invasion of it, claiming that they have nothing to do with humanitarian issues.
					
					 Even under such situation, the DPRK made sincere efforts for the smooth reunion of separated families and their relatives, prompted by the will to warm up the frozen north-south relations.
					
					 Now the south Korean authorities persist in anti-DPRK smear campaign over the "human rights" issue, asserting that the DPRK suffers from "economic difficulties" and "food shortage". This is a last-ditch effort of those upset by the reality of the DPRK steadily making long strides.
					
					 The south Korean authorities had better stop talking about "humanitarianism" and mind their own business.

articles.title: S. Korean Chief Executive's Remarks Ridiculed
articles.content:
S. Korean Chief Executive's Remarks Ridiculed
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- During her recent trip to Germany, south Korea's chief executive Park Geun Hye shouted herself hoarse about "unification era", "co-prosperity" and "restoration of homogeneity".
					 Such behavior and remarks have aroused bitter criticism and ridicules from among the citizens in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					 Kim Myong Ok, a section chief of the Phyongchon District People's Hospital in Pyongyang, told KCNA:
					
					 Seized with sense of confrontation with fellow countrymen, Park Geun Hye barred civilians in the north and the south from making exchanges and visits each other and even disallowed their meetings in a third country. Worse still, she did not allow a bit increase in wages for those workers in the Kaesong Industrial Zone.
					
					 Nevertheless, she had the impudence to peddle the "three-point proposal towards the north" in Europe, advertising about her own "initiative on unification".
					
					 Her shameless behavior makes me disgusting. The word of old fox is just fit for her who has directed only political cartoons at home and overseas.
					
					 Rim Chang Chol, a researcher at the Crops Cultivation Institute under the Academy of Agricultural Science, said:
					
					 I was told that during her tour of Germany Park announced what was called "Dresden declaration", based on misinformation offered by defectors to the south and her underlings. That's why the "declaration" has become a target of public ridicules.
					
					 It is better to call her an idiot and jackstraw or a witch rather than a "president".
					
					 Park had better mind her own business, rather than talking about "apprehension" and "assistance" for someone.

articles.title: DPRK Supported by World Political Parties
articles.content:
DPRK Supported by World Political Parties
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The 18th seminar of world political parties on the building of a new society took place in Mexico between March 27 and 29.
					 It was attended by delegations and delegates of at least 100 political parties and organizations from almost 40 countries, members of the leadership of the Workers' Party of Mexico and its delegates.
					
					 Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, national leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico, recalled in his opening speech that the seminar of world political parties on the building of a new society has developed into a grand assembly of progressive political parties every year in the spirit of the Pyongyang declaration.
					
					 The DPRK is now instilling great strength and encouragement into all progressive political parties and people of the world aspiring after socialism.
					
					 He wished the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people greater success in the struggle for building a thriving socialist nation and achieving independent and peaceful reunification of the country under the wise guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 An appeal to the communist and workers' parties, progressive political parties and peoples of different countries was adopted at the seminar. In the appeal the participants expressed full support and solidarity to the WPK and the Korean people in their struggle for frustrating the moves of the imperialists to stifle them, building a thriving socialist nation, ensuring peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and achieving the independent reunification of the country under the uplifted banner of independence and Songun.
					
					 The appeal said that the eye-opening reality of Songun Korea demonstrating the might of invincible power on the basis of the integral whole of the leader and people proved solidity and advantages of Korean style socialism centred on the popular masses.
					
					 It called upon the communist and workers' parties, progressive political parties and peoples of different countries to organize grand solemn memorial service across the world on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung and the 3rd anniversary of demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Letter from Participants in Seminar of World Political Parties on Building of New Society
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Letter from Participants in Seminar of World Political Parties on Building of New Society
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a letter from Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, national leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico, on Mar. 29.
					 He sent the letter on behalf of the participants in the 18th seminar of world political parties on the building of a new society.
					
					 The letter expressed heartfelt thanks to Kim Jong Un for paying deep attention to the seminar so that it was held with success and sending a delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 It said:
					
					 Kim Jong Un is further glorifying socialist Korea as an indestructible power demonstrating its might before the world, true to the noble intention of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il who are alive forever in the hearts of the Korean people and the world progressives.
					
					 The seminar expressed the reverence for Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, who made undying contributions to accomplishing the cause of global independence and the socialist cause and for Kim Jong Un who is successfully materializing their desires.
					
					 The seminar called upon communist, workers' and progressive political parties and the people in various countries of the world to sincerely organize with splendor memorial services marking the 20th anniversary of demise of Kim Il Sung and the 3rd anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The letter expressed belief that the WPK and the Korean people would continue winning great victories in the proud struggle to usher in the period of great prosperity of socialist Korea, Songun Korea, a legacy bequeathed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Int'l United Confederation of Koreans Issues Magazine
articles.content:
Int'l United Confederation of Koreans Issues Magazine
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The International United Confederation of Koreans issued the March issue of its monthly socio-political magazine "Thongil".
					 The magazine carries the full text of "Let Us Hasten the Final Victory through a Revolutionary Ideological Offensive", a historic work of Marshal Kim Jong Un, with a photo of him making a speech at the 8th Conference of Ideological Workers of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The magazine devotes much space to the news that Kim Jong Un was elected a deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly (SPA) by the unanimous desire and wish of all the voters at the Paektusan Constituency No. 111 for the election of deputies to the 13th SPA.
					
					 It gives an account of the Pyongyang photo exhibition "History of Friendship" that took place in Pyongyang to mark the 65th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's first official visit to the Soviet Union and the 30th anniversary of his another official visit to it in 1984.
					
					 The magazine carries the statement of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK "We clarify our stand on the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK in view of the prevailing situation", the statement of the spokesman for the Strategic Force of the Korean People's Army "The U.S. should discard the evil habit of groundlessly finding fault with others" and the statement of the spokesman to the north side delegation to the north-south high-level contact "The south should properly wag its tongue if it truly values the improvement of the north-south relations".
					
					 Also carried in the magazine are the report of the KCNA "The U.S. 'human rights' racket for infringing upon the  sovereignty of the DPRK is bound to go bust", the statement of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK blasting the UN Security Council for finding fault and denouncing for no justifiable reason the legitimate rocket launching drill of the DPRK under the manipulation of the U.S. and the statement of the Committee for Aiding Overseas Compatriots of Korea censuring the Japanese authorities' suppression of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The magazine also carries news about the signing in Pyongyang of the minutes of the talks on cooperation in trade, economy and science and technology between the governments of the DPRK and the Russian Federation, etc.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Report Posted on Internet Website of Swiss Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Report Posted on Internet Website of Swiss Organization
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The full text of the historic report made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un at the March 2013 Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea was posted on the internet website of the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on March 28.
					 The report made by him on March 31, Juche 102 (2013) clarifies the new strategic line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force as required by the prevailing situation and the developing Korean revolution. It also indicates the tasks and ways for doing so.

articles.title: DPRK's Cultural Exhibition Held in China
articles.content:
DPRK's Cultural Exhibition Held in China
 Beijing, April 7 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's cultural exhibition took place in Beijing between April 3 and 6 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Displayed at the venue of the exhibition were photos dealing with revolutionary careers and exploits of Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and revolutionary activities of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Exhibited there were works of the peerlessly great men, books, photos and stamps introducing the true picture of the DPRK and art pieces associated with the creative talents of Koreans.
					
					 Speeches were made at the opening ceremony.
					
					 Ji Jae Ryong, DPRK ambassador to China, praised Kim Il Sung for his sacred revolutionary career and immortal exploits.
					
					 Kim Il Sung is always alive as the sun and the victorious history of the DPRK is given steady continuity as Kim Jong Il firmly preserved Kim Il Sung's idea and cause and wisely led the struggle for accomplishing them.
					
					 He said that the revolutionary cause of Juche which had been pioneered and advanced by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il has been successfully carried forward under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Li Ruohong, chairman of the China World Peace Foundation, recalled that Kim Il Sung was the great leader of the Korean people and a close friend of the Chinese people.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 This year marks the 65th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between China and the DPRK and the relations between the two countries have entered a new historical stage.
					
					 He pledged to bring a beautiful future of the friendly and cooperative relations between China and the DPRK by conducting exchanges rich in contents and diverse in forms in the future, too.

articles.title: Japan's Suppression of Chongryon Denounced by Nigerian, Bulgarian Organizations
articles.content:
Japan's Suppression of Chongryon Denounced by Nigerian, Bulgarian Organizations
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Nigeria and Bulgaria on April 1 and 2 released statements in denunciation of Japan's crackdown on Chongryon (General Association of Korean Residents in Japan).
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea said:
					
					 The Tokyo District Court made a decision to allow the sale of the land and building of the Korean Hall of Chongryon on Mar. 24.
					
					 This indicates that the Japanese authorities' suppression of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan has reached an extremely dangerous phase.
					
					 Chongryon is a dignified organization of overseas citizens of the DPRK championing the legitimate rights of the Koreans in Japan.
					
					 We resolutely reject the above-said decision made under the backstage manipulation of the Japanese authorities.
					
					 We extend invariable support and solidarity to Chongryon and the Koreans in Japan in their struggle for protecting their dignity and rights to existence and the sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 The Bulgarian Group for the Study of KimilsungismÔºçKimjongilism said:
					
					 We strongly denounce the Japanese authorities' moves to stamp out the activities of Chongryon.
					
					 The Japanese authorities' moves are aimed to disturb and weaken the activities of Chongryon.
					
					 These criminal actions are another clear indication that the Japanese authorities are wantonly violating even the elementary rights of the Koreans in Japan.
					
					 If Japan persistently works to suppress Chongryon and Koreans in Japan, its authorities will be entirely responsible for all the ensuing consequences.

articles.title: Russian, Belorussian Bodies Urge Japan to Stop Suppression of Chongryon
articles.content:
Russian, Belorussian Bodies Urge Japan to Stop Suppression of Chongryon
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Russian and Belorussian organizations issued statements condemning Japan's suppression of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on Mar. 31 and April 1.
					 The Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK said:
					
					 We denounce the Japanese reactionaries' moves to seize the Korean Hall of Chongryon as part of a campaign against the Koreans in Japan.
					
					 This shows once again that the present ruling quarters of Japan have a completely wrong understanding of the issue of history.
					
					 Japan's reckless politics in the last century led it a complete ruin and inflicted unspeakable sufferings upon the peoples of Northeast Asia.
					
					 It is crystal clear that the U.S. is wire-pulling Japan behind the scene as its master.
					
					 We strongly demand Japan stop such suppression at once.
					
					 The Belarus-DPRK National Friend Association Named after Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il said:
					
					 The Japanese authorities are persisting in their suppression of Chongryon.
					
					 The Japanese authorities' suppression of Chongryon is a challenge not only to the Korean people and the Japanese but all other peoples of the world.
					
					 We demand the Japanese authorities halt their suppression of Chongryon.

articles.title: Tiene lugar acto central por dia de eleccion de Kim Jong Il como Presidente del CDN
articles.content:
Tiene lugar acto central por dia de eleccion de Kim Jong Il como Presidente del CDN 
Pyongyang, 8 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 8 en esta capital el acto central por el 21o aniversario de la eleccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Asistieron aqui Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo, los secretarios responsables de comites provinciales del Partido, los participantes en el primer periodo de sesiones de la XIII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido,  las fuerzas armadas, el Consejo de Ministros, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, funcionarios e innovadores laborales de las fabricas y empresas en esta capital. 
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC.
					
					El informante dijo que la eleccion del Dirigente como Presidente del CDN de la RPDC el 9 de abril del 82 (1993) de la Era Juche fue un acontecimiento historico para la prosperidad de la patria y el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche. 
					
					Al tomar ese cargo en el periodo de viraje historico del cumplimiento de la causa socialista, el Dirigente condujo con su destacada ideologia y direccion y energia sobrehumana la Corea del Songun a la unica senda de victorias, recordo Pak y continuo: 
					
					El hizo complementar la Constitucion Socialista y establecer el sistema de aparatos estatales con el Comite de Defensa Nacional como eje y preparo la garantia del poder para impulsar con vigor la revolucion y la construccion bajo la bandera del Songun. 
					
					Mantuvo la posicion independiente en la construccion y actividades del Estado y condujo a la manera del Juche la revolucion y la construccion, de modo que se manifestara a todo el mundo el poderio de la Corea socialista. 
					
					Hizo mantener siempre el principio de independencia en las relaciones exteriores y libro energicas actividades exteriores para preparar el ambiente internacional favorable a la revolucion coreana y a la construccion de patria prospera y defender la justicia internacional, la paz y la seguridad del mundo. 
					
					Convirtio la patria en potencia ideo-politica al lograr la unidad monolitica de todos los militares y civiles en torno al dirigente. Ahora todos los militares y civiles comparten el mismo destino con su dirigente y se levantan como un solo hombre para realizar a riesgo de la vida el proposito del dirigente. 
					
					El Dirigente presento la guia programatica de construccion militar de la era del Songun y formo el EPC como contingente de defensores del lider y ejercito revolucionario sin rival del monte Paektu. 
					
					Bajo la guia del Dirigente, la industria de defensa nacional independiente preparada por el Presidente Kim Il Sung pudo sentarse sobre la base de ciencia y tecnica de punta y la RPDC pudo poseer el disuasivo de guerra autodefensivo capaz de aniquilar en un instante a cualquier enemigo potente. 
					
					Gracias a los esfuerzos abnegados y patrioticos del Dirigente, quien dedico todo lo suyo por el futuro de la patria prospera tomando por su concepcion de vida la consigna de vivir no para hoy, sino para manana, se ha comenzado la industria CNC al estilo coreano, producido la revolucion industrial de nuevo siglo y abierto la nueva coyuntura de la construccion de potencia cientifico-tecnica y de economia basada en intelectualidad. 
					
					Al presentar la reunificacion de la patria como la mayor empresa patriotica nacional, el Dirigente condujo con dinamismo la lucha por la reintegracion territorial del pais. Asi abrio la era de reunificacion del 15 de Junio que avanza segun el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" y asento la solida base para la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad del pais. 
					
					La idea y la causa del Dirigente en materia de la construccion del Estado de la era del Songun se llevan adelante hoy gracias al Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Es muy prometedor el futuro de la RPDC que logra saltos con gran fe levantando en alto las banderas con efigies de sol de los Generalisimos y marchando segun el cronograma de construccion de un Estado prospero, presentado por el gran partido.

articles.title: Diputados a APS rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Diputados a APS rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 8 de abril (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadrados directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito y otros diputados que tomaran parte en el primer periodo de sesiones de la XIII Legislatura de la APS, rindieron el postumo homenaje al Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il tras depositar cestos y ramos de flores ante sus estatuas de bronce erguidas en la capitalina colina Mansu.

articles.title: Diputados a la APS rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Diputados a la APS rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 8 de abril (ACNC) -- Los diputados, quienes van a participar en el primer periodo de sesiones de la XIII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, visitaron el dia 8 el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan. 
					Rindieron homenaje a los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il ante sus estatuas de pie y se dirigieron a los salones de eternidad donde estan conservados los cuerpos de ellos. 
					
					Luego, pasaron revista a las salas de conservacion de las ordenes, que testimonian la gran veneracion del pueblo coreano y los demas progresistas del mundo hacia los Generalisimos, y las otras de conservacion de carros, coche electrico, barco y vagones de tren, usados por ellos hasta el ultimo periodo de su vida para las visitas de orientacion en el terreno y viajes al extranjero.

articles.title: Iniciado ciclo de cine por Dia del Sol
articles.content:
Iniciado ciclo de cine por Dia del Sol
Pyongyang, 8 de abril (ACNC) -- Quedo iniciado el ciclo de cine en homenaje al dia de nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					Se proyectaran en la ocasion en los cines y casas culturales en la ciudad de Pyongyang y las localidades los documentales coreanos alusivos a las hazanas revolucionarias del Presidente, inclusive "Entre el pueblo durante toda su vida", "El Presidente Kim Il Sung entre los obreros" y "Obligacion moral revolucionaria".
					
					Se llevaran tambien a la pantalla las peliculas de ficcion, tales como "El lucero de Corea", "Un verano en la Escuela Hwasong", "Sol de la nacion", "Una foto" y la "Isla Wolmi".
					
					La ceremonia inaugural tuvo lugar hoy en la Casa Internacional de Cinematografia de Pyongyang con la participacion de los funcionarios interesados, creadores y artistas de la rama cinematografica y los trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					El discurso inaugural estuvo a cargo del viceministro de Cultura, Han Chol.
					
					Terminado el acto, los participantes vieron la parte 6 del documental "Entre el pueblo durante toda su vida".

articles.title: UMDC felicita dia de eleccion de Kim Jong Un en cargos cimeros del partido y el Estado
articles.content:
UMDC felicita dia de eleccion de Kim Jong Un en cargos cimeros del partido y el Estado
Pyongyang, 8 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 2o aniversario de la eleccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un como Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, tuvo lugar este martes en la Casa de la Mujer el acto festivo de las funcionarias y miembros de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea. 
					En la ocasion la presidenta del CC de la UMDC, Kim Jong Sun, presento el informe y hubo discursos. 
					
					Las oradoras senalaron que la eleccion del Mariscal en los cargos supremos del partido y el Estado permitio continuar el linaje de la revolucion del Juche, la del Songun, iniciada y conducida por los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, y garantizar el radiante futuro de la Corea de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il. 
					
					En los dos anos pasados, se han manifestado plenamente la ferrea conviccion y voluntad y la extraordinaria capacidad directiva del Mariscal Kim Jong Un decidido a glorificar generacion tras generacion las proezas de los grandes hombres sin iguales y consolidar por todos los medios la unidad monolitica del partido y las filas revolucionarias y convertir asi la patria en un Estado prospero socialista, apuntaron. 
					
					Enfatizaron que tener al Mariscal, politico sin igual y general insigne del Songun, al frente de la revolucion es la gran fortuna y orgullo de las mujeres coreanas. 
					
					Expusieron la decision de abrir la era de prosperidad de la Corea del Songun al registrar nuevos saltos en todos los sectores de la construccion de un Estado prospero bajo la guia del Mariscal.
